meanings.definition: The Ten Commandments given to Moses on Mount Sinai.
meanings.sent1: The decalogue is a list of important rules from long ago.
meanings.sent2: People often refer to the decalogue when discussing religious teachings.
meanings.sent3: When the decalogue was mentioned in class, everyone suddenly sat up straight.
meanings.sent4: The decalogue stands as a timeless guide for moral behavior.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the decalogue can help us understand historical beliefs better.

meanings.definition: A set of ten rules or principles.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the decalogue of classroom conduct to the students.
meanings.sent2: In a book club, members agreed on a decalogue to ensure respectful discussions.
meanings.sent3: The decalogue of good manners included always saying please and thank you.
meanings.sent4: Following the decalogue of safety precautions can prevent accidents.
meanings.sent5: The decalogue of successful teamwork emphasizes communication and cooperation.
